items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: Infosys, ICICI Bank, HDFC Bank, HDFC Life, NIIT, ABB India, Tata Elxsi, Just Dial, TCS in focus on 21 April
items.description: Stocks to Watch, 21 Apr: Stocks like Infosys, HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, HDFC Life Insurance Company, Yes Bank, Jio Financial Services, Tata Elxsi, Just Dial, IndusInd Bank, Tata Consultancy Services, ABB India, and NIIT will be in focus on April 21.
